ygData.subject: Chant Series Question!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Do we know if the chant series can be used by 2 bards at the same time on the same mob?  Do they stack?  Ie: if both bards stick chant of frost, does the mob
ygData.messageBody:
Do we know if the chant series can be used by 2 bards at the same time on the same mob? Do they stack? Ie: if both bards stick chant of frost, does the mob take double damage?

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 50 songs
... somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly

p.s. what equips on your feet and is ac 16 str+5 sta+9 sv cold+10 Wt. 4.9. magic no drop. Bard only. Found on Scorn banshees in the Plane of Hate.

p.s.s. Imbrued Plate Mail Boots! Woo hoo! it was worth enduring a disco mid ress followed by prime-time server re-load and 90 minute downtime. BP, bracers & helm to go.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
